Module.Name: Motor3
Module.Overview: The Motor3 controller can supply up 3.5A@40V to a motor.

Register.Name: speed
Register.Description: This register specifies the motor speed.

Register.Name: direction_invert
Register.Description: This register specifies the motor direction sign.

Register.Name: encoder8
Register.Description: This register specifies the 8-bit motor encoder.

Register.Name: encoder
Register.Description: This register specifies the 32-bit motor encoder.
